it.apice.sapere.api - package it.apice.sapere.api
This package is the root of all SAPERE system interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.internal - package it.apice.sapere.api.internal
This package contains internal entities that will not be provided outside the bundle.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This package contains the definition of a Live Semantic Annotation (LSA) and relatives.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
This package contains the definition of property values supported types.
it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor - package it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor
This package contains the definition of an LSA visitor.
it.apice.sapere.api.space - package it.apice.sapere.api.space
This package contains LSA-space interfaces.
it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation - package it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
This package contains LSA-space observation features.

L

LiteralValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents a String (literal) value that can be associated to a property.
LongValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents a long value that can be associated to a property.
LSA - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This interface models an LSA: Live Semantic Annotation.
LSAEvent - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
An LSAEvent registers a modification of an LSA inside the LSA-space.
LSAFactory - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api
An LSAFactory provides basic functionalities that enables the creation of LSAs according to the SAPERE model.
LSAid - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
This interface models an LSA-id which is a unique system-wide key used to identify an LSA.
LSAidValue - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface that represents an LSA-id value that can be associated to a property.
LSAObserver - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
An LSA Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events that involve a specific LSA in the LSA-space.
LSAParser - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api
A SAPEREParser provides basic functionalities that enables the creation of LSAs from a description.
LSAspace - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space
This interface models an LSA-space (local) as seen by a SAPEREAgent, so capable of storing and retrieve LSAs whenever needed.
LSAVisitor - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.visitor
This interface models an LSA visitor.

O

observe(LSAid, LSAObserver) - Method in interface it.apice.sapere.api.space.LSAspace
Starts observing the specified LSA.

PrivilegedLSAFactory - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api
A PrivilegedLSAFactory is an extension of the LSAFactory, which provides additional facilities useful for background management.

Property - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas

This class represents an exception occurred in the SAPERE domain.

SemanticDescription - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.lsas
A Semantic Description is a collection of properties that are associated to the LSA containing the description.
SpaceEvent - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
A SpaceEvent registers a modification in LSA-space status that should be interesting for an observer.
SpaceObserver - Interface in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
An LSA-space Observer is an entity capable of listening remarkable events occurred inside the LSA-space.
SpaceOperationType - Enum in it.apice.sapere.api.space.observation
Defines the type of operation that has been observed (on the LSA-space).
